targets_paths.sql: SELECT bountyId, target FROM targets WHERE updatedDate BETWEEN date('now', '-3 days') AND date('now')
targets_paths.description: THE MEAT IS BACK ON THE MENU BOYS

targets_select.sql: SELECT a.id, a.bountyId, a.type, a.url, a.description, a.isPrimacyOfImpact, b.updatedDate FROM assets a JOIN bounties b ON a.bountyId = b.bountyId WHERE b.updatedDate > '2024-01-01' AND a.type = 'smart_contract' AND a.url NOT LIKE '%github%';
targets_select.description: Build a view of the latest updates to smart contracts bounties that are not hosted on GitHub

targets_from_last_3_days.sql: SELECT a.id, a.bountyId, a.type, a.url, a.description, a.isPrimacyOfImpact, b.updatedDate FROM assets a JOIN bounties b ON a.bountyId = b.bountyId WHERE b.updatedDate BETWEEN date('now', '-3 days') AND date('now') AND a.type = 'smart_contract' AND a.url NOT LIKE '%github%';
targets_from_last_3_days.description: Show data for targets updated in the last 3 days

targets_addresses_count.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assets a JOIN bounties b ON a.bountyId = b.bountyId WHERE b.updatedDate > '2024-01-01' AND a.type = 'smart_contract' AND a.url NOT LIKE '%github%';
targets_addresses_count.description: Count all target addresses meeting the query criteria
